column4: you could always go grab the source for that version of PHP, and compile it that way.  You'll have to meet any dependencies as well however.  Usually what I end up doing when I need a specific version, both newer and older than what the repos have.
hmm, that's the "long way" to go, I rather not do that - last resort thou
You may also find .deb packages, which are easier than compiling.
any idea whee I should look for them?
